assumptions_made.maintainability_readability: Focus on maintainability and readability over performance optimizations
assumptions_made.single_responsibility: Single Responsibility Principle - Each function/class does one thing well
assumptions_made.dependency_injection: Dependency Injection - Dependencies passed through constructors where it makes sense
assumptions_made.explicit_over_implicit: Explicit over implicit - Make dependencies and behavior explicit
assumptions_made.testability: Testability - Code should be easy to test in isolation
assumptions_made.tell_dont_ask: Maximize 'tell don't ask' principle - keep internals of class internal
assumptions_made.encapsulation: Keep internals of class internal - maximize encapsulation

decisions_made.architecture: Simple module structure - Simple rule classes loaded on bot load, contain link to scanners and have property access to data like examples, descriptions, etc. Violations also simple DTO classes
decisions_made.dependency_management: Constructor injection where it makes sense - Keep dependencies explicit and minimal
decisions_made.error_handling: Exception-based - Use exceptions for error conditions, never swallow exceptions
decisions_made.programming_paradigm: Object-oriented programming - Classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, encapsulation. Maximize OOP principles
decisions_made.properties_vs_methods: Maximize use of properties - Maximize use of properties, keep internals of class internal, maximize 'tell don't ask' principle
